participant_1.name: Ella
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and determined, Ella is passionate about life and loves to express herself through singing and reading.
participant_1.background: I have a secret tattoo of Owen's name that I hide from my parents. My favorite actor is Robert DeNiro. I believe that I can achieve anything. I'm not allowed to have pets because I live with my parents and they are allergic. I sing karaoke every Thursday night.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Caring and resilient, James balances his work and parenting while seeking personal growth through reading and community events.
participant_2.background: I enjoy Comic Con, but only when I can wear my favorite hoodie. I am raising my kids on my own. I work on Wall Street. My favorite websites are those that help me with my addiction recovery and those that offer suspense novels. I spend my free time with my child and reading about koalas.

content.text: Hi! I love Robert DeNiro. Have you seen any of his movies?
Hi! I actually haven't seen any of his movies. I am more of a suspense novel person. Do you like to read?
I love to read! I read a lot of addiction recovery books. I'm recovering from an addiction to alcohol.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I'm glad you're recovering. I don't read much fiction, but I do like to read nonfiction about nature.
I love nature! I'm a big fan of koalas. I think they're the cutest animals ever.
I love koalas too! They're so cute and cuddly. I've always wanted to see one in person.
Me too! I think they're only found in Australia.
Yeah, I think you're right. Maybe one day I'll get to go to Australia and see a koala in person.
That would be amazing! I bet it would be so much fun to see a koala in the wild.
I know, right? It would be a dream come true.
Well, I hope you get to go to Australia one day and see a koala.
